list.description: Clamps a value between an inclusive range.

list.description: Finds an object in an array that contains a specific key-value pair.

list.title: Vanilla.module:cookie
list.description: A lightweight, easy-to-use cookie management module for client-side JavaScript. This module provides functions for getting, setting, and removing cookies, as well as utilities for working with JSON data and checking browser cookie support.

list.title: Vanilla.module:cookie~get
list.description: Get a cookie value by name

list.title: Vanilla.module:cookie~getAll
list.description: Get all cookies as an object

list.title: Vanilla.module:cookie~isEnabled
list.description: Check if cookies are enabled in the browser

list.title: Vanilla.module:cookie~remove
list.description: Remove a cookie

list.title: Vanilla.module:cookie~removeAll
list.description: Remove all cookies

list.title: Vanilla.module:cookie~set
list.description: Set a cookie

list.title: Vanllia.exports.formatElapse
list.description: Creates a nice string that shows the time since the passed in date

list.title: breakpoints
list.description: Generates a media query handler for custom breakpoints.

list.title: fluid
list.description: Generates a fluid typography scale based on the provided min and max viewport and font sizes.

list.title: handleHotUpdate
list.description: Handles hot updates by restarting the server if the file matches the specified path.

list.title: prependCss
list.description: Custom Vite plugin to automatically add an @import statement in CSS files. This plugin ensures that the specified CSS path is imported at the beginning of each CSS file, after any @charset or @layer declarations.

list.title: size
list.description: Shorthand for height and width css properties.

list.title: transform
list.description: Transforms the CSS code by injecting an @import rule at the correct position.

list.title: vanilla.exports.toTristate
list.description: Returns a tristate value.
